title: Reset Your Password
subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code sent to <email>{{email}}</email>
code_success: Code verified successfully. You can now reset your password.
attempts_exceeded: You've exceeded the maximum number of attempts. Please {{link}} to request a new reset code.
password_updated: Password updated successfully. Redirecting to login...
password_rule: Password must be at least 10 characters long, contain uppercase, numbers, and special characters.
error_generic: Failed to update password. Please try again.
